turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, can you order me a coffee - a Caffe Americano specifically?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Of course, where would you like me to get it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Starbucks please. The one around the corner.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I think there are two across the corner - which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 107 K Street and 12th avenue in Washington DC.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Do you want any milk?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, just a bit of skim milk please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I add a shot of espresso please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is that all?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Also a bit of honey, just to sweeten it up and even out the espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, got it. Anything else? Maybe whipped cream? A shot of vanilla?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that'll be all.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And do you want this right away or in the future.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Right away please. I'm tired and could use this.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay I've got a Venti Americano with skim milk, a shot of espresso and a bit of honey. Does that sound right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep, that's exactly it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay just placed the order. The Venti Americano with skim milk, an extra shot of espresso and honey will be ready on the Starbucks at 12th and K in 15 minutes. They're going to send the receipt to your credit card.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks so much!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Have a good one.
